Former Liverpool coach Neil Critchley did a job on Sam Allardyce as League One Blackpool rocked Premier League West Bromwich Albion in the FA Cup.

articles.title: 'Class player' - Leicester City midfielder immediately wins over fans at new club - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: The midfielder will see out the rest of his contract after agreeing to join Coventry City on loan
articles.content:
